Package org.apache.log4j

Class Summary
EnhancedMyPatternLayout Example showing how to extend EnhancedPatternLayout to recognize additional conversion characters.
EnhancedPatternLayoutTest Test for EnhancedPatternLayout.
EnhancedPatternLayoutTest.DerivedPatternLayout Class to ensure that protected members are still available.
EnhancedPatternLayoutTestCase  
LayoutTest Tests for Layout.
LogCapture Helper class to set up and capture log messages.
MyPatternParser Example showing how to extend PatternParser to recognize additional conversion characters.
TestLogMF Unit test for LogMF.
TestLogSF Unit test for LogSF.
TestLogXF Unit test for LogXF.
VectorAppender An appender that appends logging events to a vector.
